import React from 'react' import { Checkbox, Grid, Header, Image, Menu, Ref, Segment, Sidebar, } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Sidenav = () => { const segmentRef = React.useRef() const [visible, setVisible] = React.useState(false) return ( setVisible(false)} vertical target={segmentRef} visible={visible} width='thin' > Games Channels
Clickable area

When you will click there, the sidebar will be closed.

 ) } export default Sidenav
